title: Spicy Cajun chicken and couscous
ingredients: ['4 skinless chicken breasts, sliced into chunks', 'Cajun spice blend as needed', '1 to 2 teaspoons cayenne pepper (optional)', 'olive oil as needed for frying', '2 red onions, finely chopped', '150g button mushrooms, cleaned and chopped', '1 red pepper, chopped', '1 green pepper, chopped', 'small bunch of spring onions, sliced', '320ml boiling water', '1 chicken stock cube', '250g couscous']
